maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/41.text: Acheter des Objets de la machine

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/47.text: Acheter des Objets de la machine

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: Here we are!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Nous y voilà !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: No joke, that's a big city.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Sans blague, c'est vraiment une grande ville.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: \c[3]Basin Keep\c[0]!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Le \c[3]\v[area.jungle-city.name]\c[0] !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: Bustling city of the jungle!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: La grande ville vibrante de la jungle !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: A place full of opportunity!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Un endroit plein d'opportunités !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: Yet there resides a severe lack of \c[3]Justice\c[0] dividing the rich from the poor!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Mais elle souffre sévèrement d'un manque de \c[3]Justice\c[0], qui divise les riches et les pauvres !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: I also don't like the rain.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Accessoirement je n'aime pas la pluie.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: Yes, the rain... the poor folks of this city have to suffer through it all year long!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Oui, la pluie... Les pauvres gens de cette ville doivent la subir toute l'année !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: ...Why?
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: ... Pourquoi ?

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: They say it's the Jungle's answer to this iron scar amid its sea of trees!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Ils disent que c'est la réponse de la Jungle à cette cicatrice d'acier située au milieu de son océan d'arbres !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: Bummer.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Dommage.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: So... what now?
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Donc... et maintenant ?

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: First there is a dire need to prepare for all the dangers of this wilderness!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: En premier nous avons besoin de nous préparer pour affronter tous les dangers de cette nature sauvage !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: Fortunately we will find lots of \c[3]expertly crafted goods\c[0] in this trading hotspot!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Heureusement, nous trouverons plusieurs \c[3]équipements de bonne qualité\c[0] sur cette place de marché !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: And of course, there is the urgent task to speak to the mayor!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Et bien sûr, il y a la tâche urgente de parler au maire !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: Remember the blockade in front of the temples?
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Vous vous souvenez du blocage devant les temples ?

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: Right.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Oui.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: And of course we shall fulfill our Seeker's duty and visit the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0] to the north!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Et bien entendu, nous devons remplir notre devoir de \v[lore.title.seeker] et visiter le \c[3]Carrefour des Quêtes\c[0] au nord !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: You decide to visit the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0] in \c[3]Basin Keep\c[0]. You probably need to talk to somebody to enter the temples?
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Vous décidez de visiter le \c[3]Carrefour des Quêtes\c[0] au \c[3]\v[area.jungle-city.name]\c[0]. Il faut peut-être demander pour aller aux temples ?

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: I see, another Seeker has arrived.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Je vois, un autre \v[lore.title.seeker] est arrivé.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: I ask you to excuse the rather unfortunate weather. Sadly, this is the norm in our city.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Je suis désolé pour ce mauvais temps. Malheureusement, c'est la norme dans notre ville.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: I just wish they'd finally finish the construction of the building to my back.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: J'espère juste qu'ils terminent enfin les travaux pour construire le bâtiment derrière moi.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: Anyway!\. Surely you're seeking passage to the \c[3]Ancient Temples of the jungle\c[0], correct?
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Peu importe !\. Vous voulez obtenir le passage vers les \c[3]Temples des Anciens de la jungle\c[0], pas vrai ?

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: Well, it shall be granted!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Eh-bien, vous êtes autorisés !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: \v[item.288.name]
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: \v[item.288.name]

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: Your destination is \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0], located in the \c[3]northern part of the jungle\c[0].
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Votre destination est le \c[3]\v[area.tree-dng.name]\c[0], situé dans la \c[3]partie nord de la jungle\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: Please mind the \c[3]powerplant\c[0] right next to the temple complex.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Faites attention à la \c[3]centrale électrique\c[0] à côté du complexe de temples.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: It is the major power source of our city.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: C'est la source d'électricité principale de la ville.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: It should pose no obstacle to your task, so all we ask you is to leave it intact.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Elle ne devrait pas bloquer votre chemin, donc on vous prie de la garder intacte.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: Excellent! I wish you the best for your adventures!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Excellent ! Je vous souhaite le meilleur pour vos aventures !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.orig: You will find the temples of \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0] in the \c[3]north of the jungle\c[0]. Good luck!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/58.text: Vous trouverez le temple du \c[3]\v[area.tree-dng.name]\c[0] dans la \c[3]partie nord de la jungle\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: The Boosi Man
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Le Boosinessman

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: Good evening, tiny one!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Bonsoir, petite !
Salut... ?

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: I am the \c[3]Boosi Man\c[0]!\. I'm doing business in this town, you see?
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Je suis le \c[3]Boosinessman\c[0] !\. Je fais du business dans cette ville, tu vois ?

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: And I just happen to be looking for some kind souls to help me!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Et il se trouve qu'actuellement, j'ai besoin d'âmes gentilles qui pourraient m'aider !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: See, I'm about to start a new...\. attraction in this town.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: En fait, je vais bientôt démarrer une nouvelle...\. attraction dans cette ville.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: But alas, I am in grave trouble!\. What I am missing is \c[3]\v[item.320.name]\c[0].
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Mais hélas, je suis actuellement en grande détresse !\. Ce qu'il me manque, c'est des \c[3]Flammes Lanternes\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: It's something you can only find outside in the jungle.\. A place that I am unable to visit!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: C'est quelque chose que l'on ne peut trouver que dehors, dans la jungle.\. Un endroit que je ne peux pas visiter !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: Why?
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: Well, I got my reasons and they are very legitimate.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Eh bien, j'ai mes raisons et elles sont parfaitement légitimes.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: So, do you have some free time to help big ol' me?
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Donc, est-ce que tu as un peu de temps libre pour aider un vieil homme comme moi ?

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: Terrific!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Majestueux !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: You can collect \c[3]\v[item.320.name]\c[0] from those \c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/pumpkin]\c[0]!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Tu peux récupérer des \c[3]Flammes Lanternes\c[0] à partir de ces \c[3]Citrouilles au Feu Ardent\c[0] !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: They wander about in the \c[3]infested Jungle\c[0] to the \c[3]northeast\c[0]!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Elles se baladent dans la \c[3]jungle infestée\c[0] au \c[3]nord-est\c[0] !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: I require those flames!\. They are essential for...\. decoration!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: J'ai besoin de ces flammes !\. Elles sont essentielles pour...\. la décoration !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: Well then!\. Let's work together to create the next big thing of Basin Keep!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Bon alors !\. Travaillons ensemble pour créer la prochaine grande tendance dans le \v[area.jungle-city.name] !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: Bye...
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Bye...

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: That is too bad!\. You see, my business could very well be the next big thing!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: C'est vraiment dommage !\. Tu vois, mon business pourrait bien être la prochaine grande tendance !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: You definitely want to be a part of it!\. Talk to me when you change your mind, tiny one!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Tu voudras certainement en faire partie !\. Reviens me voir si jamais tu changes d'avis, petite !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: Bye...
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Bye...

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: The Boosi Man
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Le Boosinessman

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: You can collect \c[3]\v[item.320.name]\c[0] from those \c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/pumpkin]\c[0]!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Tu peux récupérer des \c[3]Flammes Lanternes\c[0] à partir de ces \c[3]Citrouilles au Feu Ardent\c[0] !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: They wander about in the \c[3]infested Jungle\c[0] to the \c[3]northeast\c[0]!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Ils se baladent dans la \c[3]jungle infestée\c[0] au \c[3]nord-est\c[0] !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: I require those flames!\. They are essential for...\. decoration!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: J'ai besoin de ces flammes !\. Elles sont essentielles pour...\. la décoration !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: Well then!\. Let's work together to create the next big thing of Basin Keep!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Bon alors !\. Travaillons ensemble pour créer la prochaine grande tendance dans le \v[area.jungle-city.name] !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: The Boosi Man
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Le Boosinessman

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: Hi.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Salut.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: I see you collected the flames!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Je vois que vous avez récupéré les flammes !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: Terrific!\. Things are almost ready, then.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Majestueux !\. Les choses sont presque terminées !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: The only thing we need to do, is a \c[3]test run\c[0]!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: La dernière chose qu'il nous reste à faire, c'est un petit \c[3]test\c[0] !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: Tiny one, can I count on your help once again?
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Petite, est-ce que je peux encore compter sur votre aide ?

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: Spooktacular!\. I'll be inside constructing everything!\. It will only take the ghost of a second.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Spookctaculaire !\. Je vais rentrer pour tout construire !\. Cela va seulement prendre le fantôme d'une seconde.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.orig: Just follow me inside when you're ready!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/63.text: Suivez-moi à l'intérieur lorsque vous serez prête !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/72.orig: There was a HOLE here. It's gone now.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/72.text: Ici il y avait un TROU. Mais maintenant il a disparu.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: Seeker, over here!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], par ici !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: Thank you for helping us.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: Merci pour m'avoir aidée.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: The tension between Humans and Shad around here is as bad as it gets.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: La tension entre les Humains et les Shads par ici est suffisamment mauvaise comme ça.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: It really doesn't help that the mayor is acting so selfishly.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: Cela n'aide vraiment pas que le maire puisse agir aussi égoïstement.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: But where are my manners..
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: Mais où sont mes manières...

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: K'tara
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: K'tara

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: I'm \c[3]K'tara\c[0].
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: Je suis \c[3]K'tara\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: Lea, hi!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: Lea, salut !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: I was born in \c[3]V'rda Vil\c[0], a small village in the south east of Gaia's Garden.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: Je suis née à \c[3]V'rda Vil\c[0], un petit village au sud-est du \v[area.jungle.name].

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: But I spend a large amount of time with humans.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: Mais je passe beaucoup de temps avec les humains.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: Anyway, let's not dwell for too long, my village is in danger!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: En tout cas, ne perdons pas de temps avec le passé, mon village est en danger !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: You see, our village was attacked by \c[3]strange black cats\c[0].
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: Vous voyez, notre village a été attaqué par \c[3]des chats noirs étranges\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: They've already pushed us out of the north side.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: Ils nous ont déjà expulsé de la partie nord.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: It's because of this power plant... It is disrupting the ancient Track and it's punishing us for it.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: C'est à cause de cette centrale électrique... Elle perturbe l'ancien Tracé et il nous punit pour cela.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: And my people are not happy.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: Et mon peuple n'est pas content.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: They are ready to fight and I fear the worst if we don't do something.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: Ils sont prêts à se battre et je crains le pire si nous ne faisons rien.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: I'm sure if we can drive these beasts away the Shad will calm down, but we have to act fast!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: Je suis sûre que si on arrive à les faire partir, les Shads se calmeront, mais il faut agir rapidement !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: Let's first meet in \c[3]V'rda Vil\c[0]. There is a landmark in the \c[3]eastern part of the village\c[0].
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: Retrouvez-moi d'abord à \c[3]V'rda Vil\c[0]. Il y a un point de repère dans la \c[3]partie est du village\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: Oh, you already unlocked it? Let's not waste time then!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: Oh, vous l'avez déjà déverrouillé ? Alors ne perdons pas de temps !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: As said, the village is in the \c[3]south east\c[0] of the jungle.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: Comme je le disais, le village se trouve au \c[3]sud-est\c[0] de la jungle.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: The humans put up way-markers so it should be easy to find.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: Les humains ont placé des panneaux, donc il devrait être facile à trouver.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: That was clever use of sign language, Lea!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: C'était une utilisation intelligente du langage des signes, Lea !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: And the NPC even recognized it.\. I'm impressed.
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: Et le PNJ l'a même reconnu.\. Je suis impressionné.

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: Our journey shall continue, \c[3]V'rda Vil\c[0] our next destination!
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: Notre voyage doit continuer ! \c[3]V'rda Vil\c[0] sera notre prochaine destination !

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.orig: Let's go~
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/73.text: C'est parti~

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/75.orig:
The duel will take place at
\c[3]Gaia's Garden - Overgrown Path\c[0].
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/75.text:
Le duel aura lieu au
\c[3]Chemin Embroussaillé du \v[area.jungle.name]\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/75.orig:
The duel shall start 
when the area has been 
\c[3]ridden of all other opponents\c[0].
maps/jungle-city/center.json/entities/75.text:
Le duel commencera
lorsque la zone aura été
\c[3]débarrassée de tous les autres adversaires\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig: Oh I can see it now.
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text: Oh, je peux la voir maintenant.

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig: Yes, Basin Keep in all its glory is towering in front of us!
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text: Oui, le \v[area.jungle-city.name] se dresse juste en face de nous, dans toute sa splendeur !

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig: Did you notice that there's not a single laser bridge in the whole jungle?
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text: Est-ce que vous avez remarqué qu'il n'y a pas un seul pont laser dans toute la jungle ?

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig: Maybe they're hard to maintain due to the climate and vegetation...
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text: Peut-être que c'est à cause du climat et de la végétation ?

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig: Eeeek... T-that thing looked way less scary on the photos.
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text: Errk... C-Ce truc était pas aussi effrayant sur les photos.

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig: And you really already fought it before, \v[lore.title.seeker]??
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text: Et vous l'avez vraiment déjà combattu auparavant, \v[lore.title.seeker] ??

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig: Wow, so impressive!\.\. I'll trust you to watch my back then, while I weaken it with our salt!
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text: Ouah, ça devait être épatant !\.\. Je vais vous faire confiance pour protéger mes arrières, pendant que je l'affaiblis avec notre sel !

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker], it's good that you survived this rampage.\. Are you feeling well?
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], c'est bon de savoir que vous ayez survécu à ce carnage.\. Vous allez bien ?

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig: Good.\. You've done well at least venting its anger.\. I truly never saw such an unstoppable corrupted force before.
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text: Bien.\. Vous avez au moins réussi à lui faire passer ses nerfs.\. Un tel concentré de corruption et de force maléfique, je n'avais jamais vu ça.

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig: It was deeply corrupted, charged with massive toxic energy that even concentrated blasts of \c[3]Wave\c[0] could not disperse.
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text: Il était profondément corrompu, et empli d'une énergie toxique massive que même des jets concentrés d'\c[3]Onde\c[0] ne pouvait pas disperser.

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig: Such a threat will need special treatment to pacify.\. One that can't be found within \v[area.jungle.name].
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text: Une telle menace aura besoin d'un traitement bien particulier pour être calmée.\. Un qu'on ne pourra pas trouver dans le \v[area.jungle.name].

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig: To cleanse such powerful toxic energy we must apply an equally powerful force of energized salt.
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text: Pour purifier une telle puissance d'énergie toxique, il faut qu'on emploie une puissance égale de sel énergétique.
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.note: Hey, you know what... we could do now. We could argue... about NUCLEAR ENERGY !

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig: Go meet \c[3]Linde\c[0] on the \c[3]Isle of Legend\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.beach.name]\c[0] and help her extract it!
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text: Va rencontrer \c[3]Linde\c[0] sur l'\c[3]île de Légende\c[0] à l'\c[3]\v[area.beach.name]\c[0] et va l'aider à en extraire !

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker]!!\.\. This rampaging spirit is a danger to everyone.
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text: \v[lore.title.seeker] !!\.\. Cet esprit ravageur est une menace pour nous tous.

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig: Use this to put it to rest!
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text: Utilise ça pour y mettre un terme !
Ça marche pas ? C'est pas possible !

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig: Hey there, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Ready to save the city? I sure am!
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text: Hé, \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. Prêt pour sauver la ville ? Moi en tout cas je le suis !

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig: Alright!\. I will get all of that ghost's toxic attention so you better be ready!
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text: OK !\. Je vais attirer toute l'attention toxique de ce fantôme donc vous feriez mieux d'être prête !

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig: Aw, alright.\. I will wait for you here.
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text: Oh, OK.\. Je vais vous attendre ici.

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig: Don't want to stress you, but this is getting a bit painful...
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text: Je veux pas vous stresser, mais ça commence à me faire mal...

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig: Ouchie... ghost hits are as nasty as it looks.
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text: Aïlleuh... Les coups de fantômes sont vraiment aussi méchants qu'ils en ont l'air.

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig:
\c[1]QUEST FAILED\c[0]

Restart task to try again
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text:
\c[1]QUÊTE ÉCHOUÉE\c[0]

Redémarrez la quête pour réessayer.

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig: Use this wave-charger thingie to get him behind those walls!
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text: Utilisez ce machin-chose d'onde chargée pour l'atteindre derrière ces murs !
O-On a réussi ?\. Hein ?\. On a vraiment réussi... ?

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker], this was such a thrill!\. I was really worried, but you made me pull through, thank you!
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], c'était si stressant !\. J'étais vraiment inquiète, mais vous m'avez fait persévérer jusqu'au bout, merci !

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig: Oh gosh... I'm so giddy but I better go back to report on our success, before my people worry.
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text: Mon dieu... Je suis tellement effarée, mais je ferais mieux de leur dire qu'on a réussi, avant que les gars s'inquiètent pour moi.

maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.orig: So... see you around!\. And don't forget to pay us another visit to get the reward.\. Bye!
maps/jungle-city/entrance.json/entities/.text: Donc... à plus tard !\. Et n'oubliez pas de nous rendre encore visite pour obtenir la récompense.\. Bye !
